expand_filter[source]

expand_filter(x, ks=3)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class ChLin[source]

ChLin(ni, nf) :: Module

Same as nn.Module, but no need for subclasses to call super().__init__

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

FireHR[source]

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
FireHR(6,1)

FireHR(
  (conv): ConvLayer(
    (0): Conv2d(1, 8, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
    (1): BatchNorm2d(8, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
    (2): ReLU()
  )
  (chlin): Sequential(
    (0): ChLin(
      (chlin): Sequential(
        (0): Linear(in_features=14, out_features=128, bias=False)
        (1): BatchNorm1d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        (2): ReLU(inplace=True)
      )
    )
    (1): ChLin(
      (chlin): Sequential(
        (0): Linear(in_features=128, out_features=64, bias=False)
        (1): BatchNorm1d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
        (2): ReLU(inplace=True)
      )
    )
  )
  (middleconv): Sequential(
    (0): ConvLayer(
      (0): Conv2d(64, 128, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
      (1): BatchNorm2d(128, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
      (2): ReLU()
    )
    (1): ConvLayer(
      (0): Conv2d(128, 64, kernel_size=(3, 3), stride=(1, 1), padding=(1, 1), bias=False)
      (1): BatchNorm2d(64, eps=1e-05, momentum=0.1, affine=True, track_running_stats=True)
      (2): ReLU()
    )
  )
  (finalconv): Conv2d(64, 1, kernel_size=(1, 1), stride=(1, 1))
)
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

download_model_weights[source]

download_model_weights(weight_file='model512.pth')

Download model weights if they don't exist yet on ~/.firehr.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
download_model_weights()

Using local model weights /home/mnpinto/.firehr/model512.pth
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

load_pretrained_model[source]

load_pretrained_model(weights=Path('/home/mnpinto/.firehr/model512.pth'), ni=6, nc=1, half_precision=True, gpu=True)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
model = load_pretrained_model()
model.conv[0].weight.device, model.conv[0].weight.type()

(device(type='cuda', index=0), 'torch.cuda.HalfTensor')
